mapper.select: SELECT udc.commentid, udc.dynamicid, udc.content, udc.createtime, udc.likesum, udc.unlikesum, ui.username, ui.userhead, ui.class FROM user_dynamic_comment AS udc INNER JOIN user_information AS ui ON udc.userid = ui.userid WHERE udc.dynamicid = #{dynamicid} order by udc.commentid desc limit #{leftvalue},#{rightvalue}
